snippet: Firms that track benefit plans are finding their terms are improving for many employees, in areas such as company matching, vesting and fees.
abstract: Firms that track benefits plans at American companies say that there has been a trend of general improvement in defined-contribution plans; experts say employees should be able to try to get their companies to follow the lead of the nation's best 401K or retirement plans, which are usually offered by profitable organizations that can afford rich benefits.
lead_paragraph: Firms that track benefit plans are finding their terms are improving for many employees, in areas such as company matching, vesting and fees.

headline.main: The Best 401(k)s Set a Higher Bar for Others
